level.heading: HOUSING ASSISTANCE PAYMENT CONTRACT EXECUTION (ยง 14-5217)

level.text: Owners who have not previously participated in the HCVP shall attend a meeting with DCHA in which the terms of the Tenancy Addendum and the HAP contract shall be explained. DCHA may waive this requirement on a case-by-case basis, if it determines that the owner is sufficiently familiar with the requirements and responsibilities under the HCVP.

The owner and the assisted Family shall execute the dwelling lease, and the owner shall provide a copy to DCHA with signatures. DCHA shall ensure that both the owner and the assisted Family receive copies of the dwelling lease.

The owner and DCHA shall execute the HAP contract with notarized signatures. DCHA shall not execute the HAP contract until the owner has submitted IRS form W-9. DCHA shall ensure that the owner receives a copy of the executed HAP contract.
